a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Primary energy consumption by source, World, 2022
Primary energy is calculated based on the 'substitution method' which takes account of the inefficiencies in fossil fuel
production by converting non-fossil energy into the energy inputs required if they had the same conversion losses as
fossil fuels. It is measured in terawatt-hours (TWh).
Source: Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy (2023)
